00032 typedef struct _IOV_INIT_DATA {
00033 
00034     ULONG InitFlags;
00035     ULONG VerifierFlags;
00036 
00037 } IOV_INIT_DATA, *PIOV_INIT_DATA;

00039 #define IOVP_COMPLETE_REQUEST(Apc,Sa1,Sa2)   \
00040     {   \
00041         if (IopVerifierOn) \
00042             IovpCompleteRequest((Apc), (Sa1), (Sa2));   \
00043     }
00044 
00045 #define IOV_INITIALIZE_IRP(Irp, PacketSize, StackSize)   \
00046     {   \
00047         if (IopVerifierOn) \
00048             IovInitializeIrp((Irp), (PacketSize), (StackSize));   \
00049     }
00050 
00051 #define IOV_DELETE_DEVICE(DeviceObject)   \
00052     {   \
00053         if (IopVerifierOn) \
00054             IovDeleteDevice(DeviceObject);   \
00055     }
00056 
00057 #define IOV_DETACH_DEVICE(DeviceObject)   \
00058     {   \
00059         if (IopVerifierOn) \
00060             IovDetachDevice(DeviceObject);   \
00061     }
00062 
00063 #define IOV_ATTACH_DEVICE_TO_DEVICE_STACK(SourceDeviceObject, TargetDeviceObject)   \
00064     {   \
00065         if (IopVerifierOn) \
00066             IovAttachDeviceToDeviceStack((SourceDeviceObject), (TargetDeviceObject));   \
00067     }
00068 
00069 #define IOV_CANCEL_IRP(Irp, ReturnValue) \
00070         IovCancelIrp((Irp), (ReturnValue))
